author: Brynn Gingras, CNN
title: The rising number of deaths at homes have NYPD detectives fighting an 'invisible bullet'
description: As coronavirus ravages the city, New York Police Department detectives are responding to a significant rise in calls to homes where a death is reported, an increase one detective called "overwhelming."
content: The DEA mourns the loss of Detective Jack Polimeni -- another hero in blue taken too soon by #COVID19. A 23-year veteran, Jack exemplified what it means to be one of "The Greatest Detectives in the World." Our prayers are with his wife and family, who we will… [+107 chars]
